name: Stake mobile: win the game
description: In the game Stake you can relax, distract yourself and have a good time. If you like three-in-a-row games as much as millions of other players like them, then you should enjoy Stake. Same as always, move game elements in a row, try to build the longest line to pass levels and score maximum points. Spend the accumulated points in the store on a variety of bonuses that will save you in difficult moments of the game.
